name: OpenSearch
desc: Open Source, Distributed, RESTful Search Engine

options.name: dataDir
options.desc: Data directory for OpenSearch. If you change this, you need tomanually create the directory. You also need to create the opensearch  user and group, or change  services.opensearch.user and  services.opensearch.group to existing ones with access to the directory.

options.name: extraCmdLineOptions
options.desc: Extra command line options for the OpenSearch launcher.

options.name: extraJavaOptions
options.desc: Extra command line options for Java.

options.name: group
options.desc: The group OpenSearch runs as. Should be left at default unless youhave very specific needs.

options.name: logging
options.value:
''
  logger.action.name = org.opensearch.action
  logger.action.level = info
  
  appender.console.type = Console
  appender.console.name = console
  appender.console.layout.type = PatternLayout
  appender.console.layout.pattern = [%d{ISO8601}][%-5p][%-25c{1.}] %marker%m%n
  
  rootLogger.level = info
  rootLogger.appenderRef.console.ref = console
''

options.name: restartIfChanged
options.desc: Automatically restart the service on config change. This can be setto false to defer restarts on a server or cluster. Please consider thesecurity implications of inadvertently running an older version, and thepossibility of unexpected behavior caused by inconsistent versionsacross a cluster when disabling this option.

options.name: settings."discovery.type"
options.desc: The type of discovery to use.

options.name: settings."http.port"
options.desc: The port to listen on for HTTP traffic.
options.type: 16 bit unsigned integer; between 0 and 65535 (both inclusive)

options.name: settings."network.host"
options.desc: Which port this service should listen on.

options.name: settings."plugins.security.disabled"
options.desc: Whether to enable the security plugin, plugins.security.ssl.transport.keystore_filepath  or plugins.security.ssl.transport.server.pemcert_filepath  and plugins.security.ssl.transport.client.pemcert_filepath  mustbe set for this plugin to be enabled.

options.name: settings."transport.port"
options.desc: The port to listen on for transport traffic.
options.type: 16 bit unsigned integer; between 0 and 65535 (both inclusive)

options.name: user
options.desc: The user OpenSearch runs as. Should be left at default unless youhave very specific needs.
